title: Former Pakistan PM Imran Khan says a gunman thought he had killed him
description: In his first comments since the recent attack, Pakistan's former PM says two gunmen tried to kill him. Also: mass sackings begin at Twitter, and are we prepared if aliens contact us from a distant planet?
itunes:subtitle: Sitting in a wheelchair, Mr Khan spoke of the gun attack in Wazirabad
itunes:summary: In his first comments since the recent attack, Pakistan's former PM says two gunmen tried to kill him. Also: mass sackings begin at Twitter, and are we prepared if aliens contact us from a distant planet?
itunes:author: BBC World Service
